titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to modify the requirements for multiple employer plans, and for other purposes.
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to modify the requirements for multiple employer plans, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: This bill modifies the qualification requirements and fiduciary duties for certain multiple employer retirement plans with pooled plan providers.
